Interface ITrip

All Known Implementing Classes:
Trip
public interface ITrip
ITrip Interface
Author:
Zheyi Chen

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addNewStop(int stopID, LocalDateTime arrive, LocalDateTime dept)
    Add a new stop into the HashMap stops of a trip object Check if the stopId already exists in stops before call this method

    A getter method to get the routeID of this Trip Object A routeID is usually associated with multiple TripIDs

  • Method Details

    • getTripId

      int getTripId()
      A getter method to get the tripID of this Trip Object
      Returns:
      tripID of the Trip Object on which this method is called

    • getRouteId

      String getRouteId()
      A getter method to get the routeID of this Trip Object A routeID is usually associated with multiple TripIDs
      Returns:
      routeID of this ITrip

    • StopsOnTheTrip

      Collection<Integer> StopsOnTheTrip()
      Get the stops along this trip, return their IDs in a collection
      Returns:
      a collection of IDs of stops along this trip

    • hasStop

      boolean hasStop(int stopID)
      Check if the passed in stopID is contained along this trip
      Parameters:
      stopID - - ID of a stop
      Returns:
      boolean value suggests if the stop is contained this trip

    • laterThan

      List<Integer> laterThan(LocalDateTime currentTime)
      Helper method to filer out stops whose arrive time is later the currentTime parameter along this trip
      Parameters:
      currentTime - - LocalDateTime object stands for the current time
      Returns:
      a list of stopID whose arrive time is later than the currentTime

    • directToDestination

      boolean directToDestination(LocalDateTime currentTime, int source, int destination)
      Helper method to make a judgment if there this trip can reach the destination directly
      Parameters:
      currentTime - - a LocalDateTime stands for the current Time
      source - - departure station's ID
      destination - - destination station's ID
      Returns:
      boolean value, true if directly accessible by this trip, otherwise return false

    • arriveAt

      LocalDateTime arriveAt(int stopID)
      Get the time arrives at a station in a trip. Remember to use hasStop() to check if the stopID exists in stops before trying to get time information
      Parameters:
      stopID - - ID of a stop
      Returns:
      the time arrives at a certain station

    • departFrom

      LocalDateTime departFrom(int stopID)
      Get the time departure from a station in a trip. Remember to use hasStop() to check if the stopID exists in stops before trying to get time information
      Parameters:
      stopID - - ID of a stop
      Returns:
      the time departure from a certain station

    • addNewStop

      void addNewStop(int stopID, LocalDateTime arrive, LocalDateTime dept)
      Add a new stop into the HashMap stops of a trip object Check if the stopId already exists in stops before call this method
      Parameters:
      stopID - - ID of the station will be added
      arrive - - LocalDateTimeObject stands for when this trip arrives this stop
      dept - - LocalDateTime Object stands for when this trip departures from this trip
